title: Bloomberg Markets: Weiss Sees 'Historic Disconnect' for Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Weiss Sees 'Historic Disconnect' for Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Richard Weiss Chief Investment Officer American Century Investments Discussing the markets largely shrugging off geopolitical news and his concerns on a lack of fuel for growth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
